title: AskNews
description:
AskNews is re-imagining how news in consumed by humans and LLMs alike. We provide human editorial boosted by AI-powered insights to minimize bias and build a transparent view of current events. No ads 📣. No paywalls 💰. No sensationalism 😱.

Our API🔌 product provides your LLM app with rich news context at low-latency 🏎, fitting into tight spots of your stack. Quality is our top priority - dedicating a team of researchers to guaranteeing accuracy and enrichment 🧑🏽‍🔬️.
